thread.section_title: Stock Market & Finance News - Wall Street Journal
thread.title: Trump’s Moves on Trade Redraw Political Fault Lines

author: Josh Zumbrun
title: Trump’s Moves on Trade Redraw Political Fault Lines
text:
WASHINGTON—President Donald Trump’s steel and aluminum tariffs, along with his actions to crack down on China’s trade practices, are further scrambling traditional alliances in Congress, drawing praise from some leading Democrats but worrying many Republicans who are pressuring the president and his trade team to minimize the impact of the actions.
“I don’t agree with President Trump on a whole lot, but today I want to give him a big pat on the back,” Senate Minority Leader Chuck Schumer (D., N.Y.) said Thursday on the Senate...
